subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Five races remain until the 12-driver field for the 10-race Chase for the Nextel Cup is determined, and Clint Bowyer would appear to be in good shape to make it for the first time.
snippet: Five races remain until the 12-driver field for the 10-race Chase for the Nextel Cup is determined, and Clint Bowyer would appear to be in good shape to make it for the first time.
